photos.description: Palm trees and white sand beach on a tropical island.

photos.description: Aurora borealis dancing in the night sky.

photos.description: Endless sand dunes stretching to the horizon.

photos.description: Scenic country road winding through fields and forests.

photos.title: Green Forest
photos.description: Lush green forest with tall trees and sunlight filtering through.

delete.script: let id = parseInt(request.params.id); let index = db.photos.findIndex(photo => photo.id === id); if (index !== -1) { db.photos.splice(index, 1); return {} } else { return { status: 404, body: 'Photo not found' } }
